title: The sixt lampe of virginitie conteining a mirrour for maidens and matrons: or, the seuerall duties and office of all sorts of women in their vocation out of Gods word, with their due praise and dispraise by the same: togither with the names, liues, and stories of all women mentioned in holie Scriptures, either good or bad ... Newlie collected and compiled to the glorie of God, by T.B. Gentleman.
author: Bentley, Thomas, student of Gray's Inn.
publisher: At the three Cranes in the Vintree, by Thomas Dawson [and Henry Denham], for the assignes of William Seres],
